column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I ordered the Malnati classic personal pizza
column2: and for some reason what I got that day was not what I was expecting. The tomato sauce did not taste fresh
column3: and the cheese wasn't exactly tantalizing either. The crust was crispy at least
column4: but when the tomato/cheese/sausage are all subpar at best
column5: I can only give two stars. I can't explain why it really just tasted as if the pizza ingredients all came from a can as I've had amazing pizza experiences at other locations in other parts of the city.
